title: Hextech Crafting & Ultimate Skins
body: I'm just curious, I got spirit guard Udyr and pulsfire Ezreal from my chest. If i make them permanent will I get the banners and stuff? I'm guessing no, but maybe someone knows? Thanks

replies.body:
You should get the Banner and Icon with the skin as far as I know. :)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Can confirm. I unlocked both PFE and SGU from them, and got the corresponding icons.

Still sitting on my second PFE skin shard though, basically as an Essence bank.
